11.post_text:
Thanks everyone for your feedback on our curry sauce, keep those comments coming! 

As you know, in order for more people to enjoy our curry sauce, we’ve found a way to remove allergens, in this case peanuts, from the production process (the new sauce actually costs us more to produce).

We’ve tried keep it as close as possible to the original, and test respondents have told us that the sauce is a very close match. We hear your comments on the consistency of the sauce and we’ll be discussing this with our supplier.

12.post_text: We would like to thank all our loyal customers for their support and reassure them that their favourite curry sauce is here to stay. Our curry sauce now comes in a brand new packaging and no longer contains peanuts – which is great news for some allergy sufferers. We invite customers to try the sauce for themselves and we welcome any feedback at ops@sg.mcd.com
